org.numenta.nupic.encoders

Class RangeList

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.util.Tuple
      • org.numenta.nupic.util.RangeTuple<java.util.List<MinMax>,java.lang.String>
        • org.numenta.nupic.encoders.RangeList

  • public class RangeList
extends RangeTuple<java.util.List<MinMax>,java.lang.String>
    Convenience subclass of Tuple to contain the list of ranges expressed for a particular decoded output of an Encoder by using tightly constrained types without the verbosity at the instantiation site.
    Author:
    David Ray
